dialogues.text: Oh, hello traveller. Did you notice the clam digging spots near the shoreline?
You won't be able to catch clams using your normal fishing rod. You may find a clam by raking the sand in the water.
Next to clams, you may find other items that have washed ashore or have been left by people on the beach.
Would you like to give it a try?
That's the spirit! You may use this spare rake I have to try it out.
